name: Jaak Vilo
content: Bioinformatics, Algorithmics and Data Mining Group Skip to content Search Search for: BIIT is research group focusing in bioinformatics, data mining, image analysis and e-health data solutions. Our work concentrates on analysing omics data and developing novel methods and applications for easier data analysis for the wider public. BIIT members also carry out large part of Estonian action in the international life science infrastructure ELIXIR. The BIIT group helped shape the bioinformatics community in Estonia. It’s no longer active as a formal unit, but its former members now lead or work in other research groups that have grown out of that original network: Research Group of Health Informatics ELIXIR Biomedical Computer Vision Lab Alasoo Lab Machine Learning Research Group
